REF: 2013/14 BSG SURVEY REMINDER.
Dear Parent,
This is a polite reminder that the 'BSG Parent Survey' that we recently invited you to take part in will end in 7 days.
If you would like to contribute, the survey will take only a few minutes to complete and your opinions would be highly valued.
Please click here any time before 2nd June 2013 to complete the survey.
